text:
e="preserve">Mars 2020 is a Mars rover mission by NASA's Mars Exploration Program that includes the "Perseverance" rover and the "Ingenuity" helicopter drone.
It was launched on 30 July 2020 at 11:50 UTC, and will touch down in Jezero crater on Mars on 18 February 2021.
It will investigate to see if living organisms have lived or is living on Mars and if people can live there.
